event.Summary: LPS violation on switch $v1 of type $v6

description: When an LPS port joins or is enabled after the Learning Window is expired
the MAC address learning on the port will be disabled, and this trap is
generated as a notification. This trap will also be generated at the time
the Learning Window expires, with a slice and port value of 0

event.Summary: LPS on switch $v1 is enabled after learning window is expired for $v3
